page.title: 07Housing in Nantyffyllon
page.content: In the village of Nantyffyllon the {housing}is{mainly over 80 years old. Most of the houses are built in rows and are{terraced.}In Nantyffyllon the gardens are mostly at the back. The houses have changed over the years they have been modernized, with new new roof tops. Now the roof tops are made from tiles but some of the roof tops are made from slates. The windows are mainly made from wood but some of the windows have been changed to aluminium, the same with doors. Some of the windows are decorated with pretty patterns. The walls are made from stones and bricks. There are some modern homes mainly semi-detached houses and bungalows.There are{modern {council houses}on the{Ty-Derwen {Estate.}Most of the housing there is terraced. It is a very nice village.
